alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 1:50PM MST until January 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches, except up to 8 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph with areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Oakley, Albion, Almo, Malta, Rockland, and Holbrook. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow should significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
